'Active Enterprises Ltd.' is a defunct American video game developer
headquartered in Miami, Florida "[http://www.accessmylibrary.com/coms2/summary_0286-
5487678_ITM Video Creator Plays 52 Games to Win.]." [[The Miami Herald]].
which was active in the early 1990s. Their best known game, officially released
by the company, was the infamous [[Action 52]] multicart for the NES and Sega
Genesis video game consoles.
